main event: A UFO sighting occurred on July 1, 1949, involving a silvery-gray object observed flying in a westerly direction over Lake of the Woods, Ontario, Canada.
interesting points: The object was in sight for approximately 5 seconds., The sighting was reported by Dr. and Mrs. [REDACTED], who believed it to be a flying saucer., The object displayed an erratic motion akin to something thrown through the air., There was speculation linking the sighting to the poliomyelitis epidemic present at the time., No physical evidence or photographs were collected during the sighting.
location: Lake of the Woods, Ontario, Canada
witness description: Dr. and Mrs. [REDACTED], a medical doctor and his wife from Decatur, Indiana.
